customer_name: C J S Animal Adventures Inc

citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:52 am on
06-Mar-17.
Inspector knocked on the front door upon arrival. Attempted to contact licensee by phone and left message.
Inspector left a business card on the front door. Departed facility at 12:20 pm.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:52 am on
06-Mar-17.
Inspector knocked on the front door upon arrival.  Attempted to contact licensee by phone and left message. 
Inspector left a business card on the front door.  Departed facility at 12:20 pm.
